column1: This is about your response to "8 Questions for the Alt-Right" I find you to be very hypocritical. You wouldn't have the balls to actually debate me live.
My opinion on do I think WW3 is coming.

Germany promoted being the "Protector of Islam" during WW2 when they Balkanized the country. This is why I think self hating Jews like George Soros and Adolf Hitler were nothing but Islamic puppets to the Ottomon Empire which Erdogan's stated goal is to recreate the Ottomon Empire.

White people are waking up to race realism why is this? It's nature. Genetics compete & the white species feels it's on the decline since they are the minority world wide losing homelands. Knowing this deep down your natural instinct is to survive. Don't defy science! WHITE PRIDE WORLD WIDE!
2018 The Year of the Earth Dog - Communicative, serious, and responsible in work. Seems to be the case for most conservatives. Liberals have lost their minds. #MAGA
